languages.text: "Ты источаешь скверну Той, Что Жаждет. Стоит тебе оказаться рядом — и все мое естество требует новых жертв, дабы заглушить ее зов..."
"You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."
languages.original_text: "Ты источаешь скверну Той, Что Жаждет. Стоит тебе оказаться рядом — и все мое естество требует новых жертв, дабы заглушить ее зов..."

traits.locale_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你散发着饥渴女士的腐化气息。每当你靠近时，我的浑身上下都在叫嚣着，渴求新的祭品来盖过她的呼唤……”
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: “你散发着饥渴女士的腐化气息。每当你靠近时，我的浑身上下都在叫嚣着，渴求新的祭品来盖过她的呼唤……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous suintez la corruption de l'Assoiffée. Quand je vous vois, tout mon être réclame des sacrifices pour noyer son appel... »
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous suintez la corruption de l'Assoiffée. Quand je vous vois, tout mon être réclame des sacrifices pour noyer son appel... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr strahlt die Korruption von Ihr, die dürstet, aus. Wann immer Ihr in meiner Nähe seid, schreit mein ganzes Wesen nach neuen Opfern, um ihren Ruf zu übertönen ..."
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr strahlt die Korruption von Ihr, die dürstet, aus. Wann immer Ihr in meiner Nähe seid, schreit mein ganzes Wesen nach neuen Opfern, um ihren Ruf zu übertönen ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前には〈かの渇きたる女〉の堕落がにじみ出ている。お前が近くにいる時はいつも、俺という存在は彼女の呼びかけをかき消すために新たな犠牲を求める…」
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: 「お前には〈かの渇きたる女〉の堕落がにじみ出ている。お前が近くにいる時はいつも、俺という存在は彼女の呼びかけをかき消すために新たな犠牲を求める…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Desprendes la corrupción de la Sedienta. Cuando estás cerca, mi cuerpo entero ansía sacrificios con los que calla su llamada...».
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: «Desprendes la corrupción de la Sedienta. Cuando estás cerca, mi cuerpo entero ansía sacrificios con los que calla su llamada...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

languages.text: "Damarlarında Susayan'ın yozlaşmışlığı akıyor. Ne zaman yamacıma gelsen tüm vücudum onun çağrılarını dindirecek yeni kurbanlar için feryat ediyor."
languages.original_text: "You exude the corruption of She Who Thirsts. Whenever you are near, my whole being clamours for new sacrifices to drown out her call..."

traits.locale_text: "Damarlarında Susayan'ın yozlaşmışlığı akıyor. Ne zaman yamacıma gelsen tüm vücudum onun çağrılarını dindirecek yeni kurbanlar için feryat ediyor."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
